Aug. 8, 1939 D Blyth (Worksop) Contest
Blyth (Worksop) Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
blyth-worksop-contest
None
Recollections of Weber
The Showground, Blyth Hall Park, Blyth, Notts Prizes - 1st £10 and cup, 2nd £7, 3rd £5. March contest - 1st(£2) Brodsworth Colliery, 2nd(£1) Firbeck Colliery. Promoted by Blyth Agricultural Society. 4 bands competed.
Jan. 30, 2014, 11:12 a.m. Sept. 6, 2016, 11:55 a.m.
1 Firbeck Colliery Alexander Hilton
2 Brodsworth Colliery Band W. Park
3 Harworth Brass H. Kennedy
4 Attercliffe Institute Unknown
